Judul: ANALYSIS OF BRAND AWARENESS AND PERCEPTIONS OF X'S TARGET CUSTOMER IN BANDUNG TOWARD XYZ
Abstrak: A research is conducted to know what the knowledge and behavior of youth customers in X about/toward XYZ brand is. The research is conducted by distributing questionnaire to 100 respondents in malls in Bandung, who have X stores age 15-19 years old, to know how the respondents brand awareness toward XYZ, they prefer XYZ or not, and what the customer perception toward XYZ is.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Dr. Reza Ashari Nasution, ST.
Kata Kunci: brand awareness, preferred brand, brand perception
